mapper.select: select b.drugId,a.itemName,a.spec,a.vendor,sum(b.amount) num,a.unit,b.price from dic_drug a,store b where a.id=b.drugId and a.enabled = 1 and ( a.itemName like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') ) OR ( a.wb like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') ) OR ( a.py like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') ) group by b.drugId,a.itemName,a.spec,a.vendor,a.unit,b.price
